companies.name: HP
companies.description: HP (Hewlett-Packard) is a global leader in personal computing, printing, and related hardware and software solutions. Founded in 1939 and headquartered in Palo Alto, California, HP is renowned for its innovation in laptops, desktops, printers, and enterprise IT solutions. The company serves consumers, businesses, and institutions worldwide, focusing on technology that improves lives and work. HP is recognized for its strong brand, extensive product portfolio, and commitment to sustainability and digital transformation.
